price: 42. Atau Kami perlihatkan kepadamu (azab) yang telah Kami ancamkan kepada mereka.*(785) Maka sungguh, Kami berkuasa atas mereka.
arabic: أَوۡ نُرِيَنَّكَ ٱلَّذِي وَعَدۡنَٰهُمۡ فَإِنَّا عَلَيۡهِم مُّقۡتَدِرُونَ
footnotes: *785). Kemenangan Nabi Muhammad -ṣallallāhu 'alaihi wa sallam- dan kehancuran kaum musyrik.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: aw nuriyannaka alladhī waʿadnāhum fa-innā ʿalayhim muq'tadirūna
